Package lu.uni.geko.weaver.add

The add package of the weaver plug-in for GeKo, a generic model weaver.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
MightyAdderExt The interface to be implemented by clients that extend the extension point lu.uni.geko.weaver.add.mightyadderext.
SimpleAdderExt The interface to be implemented by clients that extend the extension point lu.uni.geko.weaver.add.simpleadderext.
 

Class Summary
DefaultSimpleAdder The default implementation of the extension point lu.uni.geko.weaver.add.simpleadderext that returns the base variant of the containment reference used in the advice where possible and otherwise guesses a containment reference of the root of the woven model based on the type.
MainAdder A utility class to access the functionality provided by extensions of the SimpleAdderExt and MightyAdderExt extension points.
SimpleAdderWrapper A default implementation of the extension point lu.uni.geko.weaver.add.mightyadderext that wraps a simple adder so that it can be used like a might adder (object adapter pattern).
 

Package lu.uni.geko.weaver.add Description

The add package of the weaver plug-in for GeKo, a generic model weaver. Responsible for adding advice elements to the woven model.
